_description: Windows Installer standard directories with WiX usage examples

standard_directories.name: AdminToolsFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Administrative Tools folder

standard_directories.name: AppDataFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the roaming application data folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="AppDataFolder">
    <Directory Id="MyAppData" Name="MyApp">
        <Component Id="UserConfig" Guid="*">
            <File Source="user-config.xml" />
        </Component>
    </Directory>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: CommonAppDataFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the application data folder for all users
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="CommonAppDataFolder">
    <Directory Id="MyCommonData" Name="MyApp">
        <Component Id="SharedConfig" Guid="*">
            <File Source="shared-config.xml" />
        </Component>
    </Directory>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: CommonFiles64Folder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Common Files folder for 64-bit applications

standard_directories.name: CommonFilesFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Common Files folder

standard_directories.name: DesktopFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the user's desktop folder
standard_directories.example:
<Shortcut Id="DesktopShortcut"
    Name="My Application"
    Directory="DesktopFolder"
    Target="[#MyApp.exe]"
    WorkingDirectory="INSTALLDIR" />

standard_directories.name: FavoritesFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Favorites folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="FavoritesFolder">
    <Component Id="Favorite" Guid="*">
        <util:InternetShortcut Id="MyFavorite" Name="My Site" Target="https://example.com" />
    </Component>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: FontsFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Fonts folder

standard_directories.name: LocalAppDataFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the local application data folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="LocalAppDataFolder">
    <Directory Id="MyLocalData" Name="MyApp">
        <Component Id="LocalCache" Guid="*">
            <File Source="cache.db" />
        </Component>
    </Directory>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: MyPicturesFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the user's pictures folder

standard_directories.name: NetHoodFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Network Neighborhood folder

standard_directories.name: PersonalFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the user's personal folder (Documents)

standard_directories.name: PrintHoodFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Printers folder

standard_directories.name: ProgramFiles6432Folder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Program Files folder (architecture-aware)
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="ProgramFiles6432Folder">
    <!-- Resolves to Program Files on 64-bit, Program Files (x86) on 32-bit when run from 32-bit process -->
    <Directory Id="INSTALLDIR" Name="MyApp" />
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: ProgramFiles64Folder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Program Files folder for 64-bit applications
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="ProgramFiles64Folder">
    <Directory Id="INSTALLDIR" Name="MyApp">
        <Component Id="MainExe64" Guid="*">
            <File Source="bin\x64\MyApp.exe" />
        </Component>
    </Directory>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: ProgramFilesFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Program Files folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="ProgramFilesFolder">
    <Directory Id="INSTALLDIR" Name="MyApp">
        <Component Id="MainExe" Guid="*">
            <File Source="bin\MyApp.exe" KeyPath="yes" />
        </Component>
    </Directory>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: ProgramMenuFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Program menu folder
standard_directories.example:
<Shortcut Id="StartMenuShortcut"
    Name="My Application"
    Directory="ProgramMenuFolder"
    Target="[#MyApp.exe]"
    WorkingDirectory="INSTALLDIR"
    Icon="AppIcon" />

standard_directories.name: RecentFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Recent folder

standard_directories.name: SendToFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Send To folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="SendToFolder">
    <Component Id="SendToShortcut" Guid="*">
        <Shortcut Id="SendTo" Name="Send to MyApp" Target="[#MyApp.exe]" />
    </Component>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: StartMenuFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Start menu folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="StartMenuFolder">
    <Directory Id="MyAppMenu" Name="My Application">
        <Component Id="StartMenuShortcuts" Guid="*">
            <Shortcut Id="LaunchApp" Name="My Application" Target="[#MyApp.exe]" />
            <Shortcut Id="Uninstall" Name="Uninstall" Target="[System64Folder]msiexec.exe" Arguments="/x [ProductCode]" />
            <RemoveFolder Id="RemoveMenuFolder" On="uninstall" />
            <RegistryValue Root="HKCU" Key="Software\MyCompany\MyApp" Name="StartMenu" Type="integer" Value="1" KeyPath="yes" />
        </Component>
    </Directory>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: StartupFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Startup folder
standard_directories.example:
<StandardDirectory Id="StartupFolder">
    <Component Id="AutoStart" Guid="*">
        <Shortcut Id="StartupShortcut" Name="MyApp" Target="[#MyApp.exe]" />
        <RegistryValue Root="HKCU" Key="Software\MyCompany\MyApp" Name="Startup" Type="integer" Value="1" KeyPath="yes" />
    </Component>
</StandardDirectory>

standard_directories.name: System16Folder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the System folder (16-bit)

standard_directories.name: System64Folder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the System folder (64-bit)

standard_directories.name: SystemFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the System folder (32-bit)

standard_directories.name: TempFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Temp folder

standard_directories.name: TemplateFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Templates folder

standard_directories.name: WindowsFolder
standard_directories.description: Full path to the Windows folder

standard_directories.name: WindowsVolume
standard_directories.description: Volume of the Windows folder
